original_title: Wanna Fuck My Daughter Gotta Fuck Me First 19
overview: These nosey, (and horny), Mothers have a set of rules in their house. When their sexually curious daughters bring home a guy, the deal is, the Mom gets the fuck the guy first! That way, these moms can determine if he's good enough for their sweet princess.
tagline: You can have him, when I'm done!
title: Wanna Fuck My Daughter Gotta Fuck Me First 19
